meanings.sent1: She preinvites her friends to the party next week.
meanings.sent2: He always preinvites guests to his annual barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The cat preinvites the birds to a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The sun preinvites the flowers to open up and bask in its warmth.
meanings.sent5: The teacher preinvites the students to participate in the science experiment.

meanings.definition: Invitations sent before the main event.
meanings.sent1: The preinvites for the wedding arrived in beautiful envelopes.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the preinvites for the charity gala.
meanings.sent3: The preinvites for the movie premiere were mistakenly sent to the wrong address.
meanings.sent4: The preinvites fluttered in the wind, announcing the upcoming party.
meanings.sent5: He treasured the preinvites to the exclusive art exhibition.
